select p.*, sum(detail_cnt) as sales, e.p_ori_filename, e.p_sys_filename from (select a.p_idx, a.p_name, p_price, p_discount, p_disprice, p_wday, p_modifyday, p_size, p_status, b.p_category_idx, p_category_large, p_category_small, ifnull(avg(review_stars),0) as avg_reviews_stars, count(review_stars) as cnt_reviews from product a join p_category b on a.p_category_idx = b.p_category_idx left join review c on a.p_idx = c.p_idx where a.p_idx in (select p_idx from product where seller_idx=(select seller_idx from sellerstory where midx=#{member_id})) group by a.p_idx) as p left join detail d on p.p_idx = d.p_idx join product_img e on p.p_idx=e.p_idx where p.p_idx in (select p_idx from product where seller_idx=(select seller_idx from sellerstory where midx=#{member_id}))
and (p.p_idx like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or p_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))
and p_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
and p.p_idx like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
and p.p_status=#{status}
and (p_category_large=1 or p_category_large=2)
and p_category_large=1
and p_category_large=2
and p_category_idx=#{category}
group by p.p_idx
order by p.p_wday desc
order by sales desc
order by p.p_disprice desc
order by p.p_disprice asc
order by p.cnt_reviews desc
order by p.avg_reviews_stars desc
select count(*) from product where p_name = #{p_name}
select count(*) from spring_member where member_id=#{member_id}
select max(p_idx) as p_idx from product
select p_idx, p_name from product where seller_idx = (select seller_idx from sellerstory where midx=#{member_id})
